competitors.name: Intel
competitors.notes: Primary CPU competitor. Intel's Core series processors held significant lead in performance and efficiency. Intel's Core 2 Quads outperformed AMD's Phenom II

competitors.name: NVIDIA
competitors.notes: Primary GPU competitor. Released GTX 480, GTX 470, GTX 465, and successful GTX 460 1GB. Unveiled DirectX 11 Fermi architecture in March 2010

context: Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. is a semiconductor company designing CPUs, GPUs, and data center chips focused on processors for PCs, gaming, data centers, and embedded systems. Struggling financially while Intel dominated. Spun off manufacturing as GlobalFoundries.
